title: Kununu Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Kununu.com, Germany's leading employer review platform. Search by job title, location, employment type, and more. Supports API-first scraping with HTML fallback for maximum reliability.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Kununu search URL (e.g., https://www.kununu.com/de/jobs?q=developer&l=berlin). If provided, this overrides other search parameters.

jobTitle.title: Job Title
jobTitle.description: Job title or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Marketing Manager', 'Data Scientist').

homeOffice.title: Home Office
homeOffice.description: Filter for remote/home office positions only.

employmentType.title: Employment Type
employmentType.description: Employment type filter (e.g., 'vollzeit' for full-time, 'teilzeit' for part-time, 'praktikum' for internship, 'minijobs').

careerLevel.title: Career Level
careerLevel.description: Career level filter for targeting specific experience levels.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: When enabled, scraper visits each job detail page to extract complete descriptions and additional information. Disable for faster scraping with basic data only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Number of Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to extract. Set higher for comprehensive results or lower for quick tests.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Scrape
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to process. Prevents excessive scraping.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies recommended for Kununu to avoid rate limits and blocking.
